h2. Data structure changes
h3. FAQ nodetypes changed
* Node property added *exo:link* to *exo:faqQuestion*
{code:xml}
<propertyDefinition name="exo:link" requiredType="String" autoCreated="false" mandatory="false" onParentVersion="COPY" protected="false" multiple="false">
	<valueConstraints/>
</propertyDefinition>
{code}
 
1.1.1 Forum nodetypes changed

* Node type added *exo:userDeleted*
 
{code:xml}
<nodeType name="exo:userDeleted" isMixin="false" hasOrderableChildNodes="false" primaryItemName="">
		<supertypes>
			<supertype>nt:base</supertype>
		</supertypes> 
		<childNodeDefinitions>
			<childNodeDefinition name="*" defaultPrimaryType="exo:forumUserProfile" autoCreated="false" mandatory="false" onParentVersion="COPY" protected="false" sameNameSiblings="true">
				<requiredPrimaryTypes>
					<requiredPrimaryType>exo:forumUserProfile</requiredPrimaryType>
				</requiredPrimaryTypes>
			</childNodeDefinition>
		</childNodeDefinitions>
	</nodeType>
{code}
 * Node type modified *exo:forumWatching*	
 - change mandatory field for exo:emailWatching and exo:userWatching from true to be false
{code:xml}
  <propertyDefinition name="exo:emailWatching" requiredType="String" autoCreated="false" mandatory="false" onParentVersion="COPY" protected="false" multiple="true"> 			   <valueConstraints/>
  </propertyDefinition>
  <propertyDefinition name="exo:userWatching" requiredType="String" autoCreated="false" mandatory="false" onParentVersion="COPY" protected="false" multiple="true">
    <valueConstraints/>
  </propertyDefinition>
{code}
